definitions.text: in accordance with truth or fact or reality
examples: they don't really listen to us
baseball rightfully is the nation's pastime
she praised him sincerely for his victory
was unfeignedly glad to see his old teacher
we are truly sorry for the inconvenience

definitions.text: in fact (used as intensifiers or sentence modifiers)
examples: in truth, moral decay hastened the decline of the Roman Empire
really, you shouldn't have done it
